<<<<<<< HEAD
An apology for the present government, and governour: with an answer to severall objections against them, and twenty queries propounded for those who are unsatisfied, to consider, and answer, if they please. / By Samuel Richardson. Richardson, Samuel, fl. 1643-1658.
15, [1] p.
Printed and are to be sold by Gyles Calvert, at at [sic] his shop the west end of Pauls., London, : 1654.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "7ber [i.e., September] 30th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
